content:
I am Hsuan-Ling Lin, and I am pursuing a Master’s degree in Computer Science at Rice University. My current GPA is 4.0 and relevant coursework includes Database System Implementation and Web development and Design since I want to solidify my knowledge in databases, and I am curious about how frontend works.
I was an SDE intern at Amazon that responsible for designing and implementing an API using Java to aggregate data to client. I am familiar with the AWS ecosystem. My technical capabilities are Python and Java and I have experience in designing web applications using Java Spring and Django. My career interest is to design services to help people’s lives easier and satisfy their needs.
summary: I am Hsuan-Ling Lin, and I am pursuing a Master’s degree in Computer Science at Rice University. My current GPA is 4.0 and relevant coursework includes Database System Implementation and Web development and Design since I want to solidify my knowledge in databases, and I am curious about how frontend works.
title: Hsuan-Ling Lin

content:
GotchaDev is a facebook-like social networking web application. GotchaDev exploited React and Redux to construct front-end, realized client-server communication by RESTful APIs, implemented back-end by Node.js and MongoDB. The E2E test and unit test used Jest and Enzyme to achieved 80% test coverage.
GotchaDev provides following functionality:
users can register a new account or log in with third party authentications. The password is hashed and salted. screenshot of third-party login Display user feed. Users can post and comment articles, and follow other users. screenshot of GotchaDev user feed Users can customize the profile. screenshot of customizing profile
summary: A social networking web application. https://gotchadev.surge.sh/
title: GotchaDev - Full Stack Web Development · ReactJS

content: Built a relational database from scratch with implementing LRU buffer manager, and B+-tree for page management. Developed a SQL compiler and a RA optimizer to support SQL semantic check and generate optimal executable plans. Implemented a two-phase multi-way merge sort for sorting a file in the database system.
title: MyDB · Relational Database System · C++

content: Designed a reliable file transfer protocol using UDP that using only 1MB of memory to transmit files with any size. Built a robust protocol by designing smart ACK response, error detection, and re-transmission mechanisms to handle unreliable network such as packet delay, drop, reorder, mangle, and duplicate.
summary: A reliable file transfer protocol using customized UDP.
title: Reliable File Transfer Protocol · C/C++ · Socket Programming

content:
The JKO e-ticketing backend service is built by Java Spring Boot with order, ticket and content management modules. The sports team can launch events, sell tickets, verify entrance tickets and manage orders. Customers can buy tickets and transfer tickets through system.
The e-ticketing system is implemented by Java Spring Boot, using RESTful APIs, constructed business need database by MySQL, deployed by Docker, adopted Jenkins for CI/CD and ELK stack for log management.
summary: A profit-making e-ticketing service with order, ticket and content management modules.
title: JKO e-ticketing system
